entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries near midnight and ending before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
